EmailTemplate.subject: Turbofest West & Feedback Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> {{Lead.First Name:default=Good Morning}}: With the Turbofest West dust settled, we ask that you please complete our 1-minute Survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/3V7TY5N>
Thanks again for joining us in San Francisco, and we look forward to hearing from you soon! Thanks as always, Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
